system.description:
Time: 15−RSI seconds+Ritual: Prayer/Spoken Riddle
Range: 1 Listener+Duration: 10 (MS); 30 (CS) mins.

Poses a riddle that the listener must answer or make a successful WIL ×3 check to ignore. Those puzzled by the riddle can perform no other action that requires concentration, and suffer a special penalty to all skills of −10 for Duration. Riddle must be in a language known by listener and involve a familiar subject. The priest must know the answer.
